details.description:
A description of special aspects of the macromolecular assembly.

               In the PDB, 'representative helical assembly', 'complete point assembly',
	       'complete icosahedral assembly', 'software_defined_assembly', 'author_defined_assembly',
	       and 'author_and_software_defined_assembly' are considered "biologically relevant assemblies.

rcsb_description.text:
A description of special aspects of the macromolecular assembly.

               In the PDB, 'representative helical assembly', 'complete point assembly',
	       'complete icosahedral assembly', 'software_defined_assembly', 'author_defined_assembly',
	       and 'author_and_software_defined_assembly' are considered "biologically relevant assemblies.

oligomeric_details.description: Provides the details of the oligomeric state of the assembly.

rcsb_description.text: Provides the details of the oligomeric state of the assembly.
Enter the oligomeric state of your system. You may select unknown if you have no biophysical evidence to support any choice.

rcsb_candidate_assembly.description:
Candidate macromolecular assembly.

 Excludes the following cases classified in pdbx_struct_asembly.details:

 'crystal asymmetric unit', 'crystal asymmetric unit, crystal frame', 'helical asymmetric unit',
 'helical asymmetric unit, std helical frame','icosahedral 23 hexamer', 'icosahedral asymmetric unit',
 'icosahedral asymmetric unit, std point frame','icosahedral pentamer', 'pentasymmetron capsid unit',
 'point asymmetric unit', 'point asymmetric unit, std point frame','trisymmetron capsid unit',
  and 'deposited_coordinates'.

rcsb_description.text:
Candidate macromolecular assembly.

 Excludes the following cases classified in pdbx_struct_asembly.details:

 'crystal asymmetric unit', 'crystal asymmetric unit, crystal frame', 'helical asymmetric unit',
 'helical asymmetric unit, std helical frame','icosahedral 23 hexamer', 'icosahedral asymmetric unit',
 'icosahedral asymmetric unit, std point frame','icosahedral pentamer', 'pentasymmetron capsid unit',
 'point asymmetric unit', 'point asymmetric unit, std point frame','trisymmetron capsid unit',
  and 'deposited_coordinates'.

 This item may be expressed as a comma separated list of identifiers.

oper_expression.description:
Identifies the operation of collection of operations
 from category PDBX_STRUCT_OPER_LIST.

 Operation expressions may have the forms:

  (1)        the single operation 1
  (1,2,5)    the operations 1, 2, 5
  (1-4)      the operations 1,2,3 and 4
  (1,2)(3,4) the combinations of operations
             3 and 4 followed by 1 and 2 (i.e.
             the cartesian product of parenthetical
             groups applied from right to left)

rcsb_description.text:
Identifies the operation of collection of operations
 from category PDBX_STRUCT_OPER_LIST.

 Operation expressions may have the forms:

  (1)        the single operation 1
  (1,2,5)    the operations 1, 2, 5
  (1-4)      the operations 1,2,3 and 4
  (1,2)(3,4) the combinations of operations
             3 and 4 followed by 1 and 2 (i.e.
             the cartesian product of parenthetical
             groups applied from right to left)

num_interfaces.description: Number of geometrically equivalent (i.e. same asym_ids on either side) polymer-polymer interfaces in the assembly

num_interface_entities.description: Number of polymer-polymer interface entities, grouping equivalent interfaces at the entity level (i.e. same entity_ids on either side, with similar but not identical binding sites)

num_homomeric_interface_entities.description: Number of homomeric (both partners are the same polymeric entity) interface entities

num_heteromeric_interface_entities.description: Number of heteromeric (both partners are different polymeric entities) interface entities

num_isologous_interface_entities.description: Number of isologous (both binding sites are same, i.e. interface is symmetric) interface entities

num_heterologous_interface_entities.description: Number of heterologous (both binding sites are different) interface entities

num_na_interface_entities.description: Number of nucleic acid-nucleic acid interface entities

num_prot-na_interface_entities.description: Number of protein-nucleic acid interface entities

total_assembly_buried_surface_area.description: Total buried surface area calculated as the sum of buried surface areas over all interfaces

total_number_interface_residues.description: Total number of interfacing residues in the assembly, calculated as the sum of interfacing residues over all interfaces

rcsb_id.description:
A unique identifier for each object in this assembly container formed by
 a dash separated concatenation of entry and assembly identifiers.

rcsb_description.text:
A unique identifier for each object in this assembly container formed by
 a dash separated concatenation of entry and assembly identifiers.
Symmetry Symbol

symbol.description: Symmetry symbol refers to point group or helical symmetry of identical polymeric subunits in Schönflies notation. Contains point group symbol (e.g., C2, C5, D2, T, O, I) or H for helical symmetry.

rcsb_description.text: Symmetry Type

type.description: Symmetry type refers to point group or helical symmetry of identical polymeric subunits. Contains point group types (e.g. Cyclic, Dihedral) or Helical for helical symmetry.

items.description: Each type of different subunits is assigned a latter. The number of equivalent subunits is added as a coefficient after each letter (except 1 which is not added explicitly).

stoichiometry.description: Stoichiometry of a complex represents the quantitative description and composition of its subunits.

rcsb_description.text: Oligomeric State

oligomeric_state.description: Oligomeric state refers to a composition of polymeric subunits in quaternary structure. Quaternary structure may be composed either exclusively of several copies of identical subunits, in which case they are termed homo-oligomers, or alternatively by at least one copy of different subunits (hetero-oligomers). Quaternary structure composed of a single subunit is denoted as 'Monomer'.

items.description: Subunits that belong to the cluster, identified by asym_id and optionally by assembly operator id(s).

asym_id.description: Internal chain ID used in mmCIF files to uniquely identify structural elements in the asymmetric unit.

pdbx_struct_oper_list_ids.description: Optional list of operator ids (pdbx_struct_oper_list.id) as appears in pdbx_struct_assembly_gen.oper_expression. One operator id per operand in the expression (most cases have only 1 operator). If it's not given then identity operator is assumed.

rcsb_description.text: Average RMSD

avg_rmsd.description: Average RMSD between members of a given cluster.

start.description: Describes x,y,z coordinate of the start point of the symmetry axis.

end.description: Describes x,y,z coordinates of the end point of the symmetry axis.

order.description: The number of times (order of rotation) that a subunit can be repeated by a rotation operation, being transformed into a new state indistinguishable from its starting state.

items.description: The orientation of the principal rotation (symmetry) axis.

rotation_axes.description: Specifies a single or multiple rotation axes through the same point.

rcsb_description.text: Symmetry Class

kind.description: The granularity at which the symmetry calculation is performed. In 'Global Symmetry' all polymeric subunits in assembly are used. In 'Local Symmetry' only a subset of polymeric subunits is considered. In 'Pseudo Symmetry' the threshold for subunits similarity is relaxed.

rcsb_struct_symmetry_provenance_code.description: The title and version of software package used for symmetry calculations.

rcsb_description.text: Protein Symmetry (Browser ID)

id.description: Automatically assigned ID to uniquely identify the symmetry term in the Protein Symmetry Browser.

rcsb_description.text: Symmetry Name

name.description: A human-readable term describing protein symmetry.

major_revision.description: The major version number of the latest revision.

minor_revision.description: The minor version number of the latest revision.

revision_date.description: The release date of the latest revision item.

title: Core Assembly
description: JSON schema for entity level core data. Combines RCSB Exchange Database schema: json-schema-min-pdbx_core_assembly.json and RCSB Data Warehouse schema: json-schema-core_assembly.json
